description: This dataset is a list of active patents issued to Health Research, Inc. on behalf of Roswell Park Cancer Institute (RPCI).  It includes the patent number and date of issuance as well as the patent title.

metadata.description: This dataset is a list of active patents issued to Health Research, Inc. on behalf of Roswell Park Cancer Institute (RPCI).  It includes the patent number and date of issuance as well as the patent title.

name: US Patents Issued to Health Research Inc on Behalf of Roswell Park Cancer Institute
